channel.title: The Grain Dance
channel.description: Recent content on The Grain Dance

item.title: First Pre-Wedding Session: a Fun, Scary, Workout
item.description: I’ve always wanted to shoot pre-wedding, but also I’ve been scared to offer my (admitredly amateur) servies. But the opportunity finally came, and here’s my story.

item.title: My (First) Journey Photographing Indoor Gig
item.description: When I heard that one of my favorite local shoegaze scene was going to do a gig promoting their new album, and they allowed cameras? I couldn’t skip this opportunity. One tiny problem though. It’s an indoor gig.

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Welcome, I’m sure that you’re not finding this from google or something because this is stuff is just too personal but if you do. Welcome!

item.title: About
item.description:
My name is Muhammad Alif Farchan. Graduated with International Relations degree back in 2023, worked as video editor before and now I’m the branding guy at a Jakarta & London based consulting firm.

Since my significant other introduced me to film photography around 2024, I’ve been using it as an escapism from this capitalistic hell hole that has been draining my sanity every time I clock in.
